ComicInfo.Title: OK You Guys; The Triangle Tryst; The Great American Drug Scene!; The Bill Bland Show!; Art in America; Portrait of the "Me" Generation!; Flakeydom's Finest Moments!; Freeway Funnies; Nightmares of Eminent People!; Are You a Boozhie?; The Mansard-roof Syndrome; Welcome to the House of Snap Judgements; New York Again; Useless Objects; Stupidity Patrol; Time-Warped; 5 Great Moments in the Life of Jimmy Durante; Where's the Party?; The Sacred Sands of Pootweet; The Earth Gets a Check-up!; Looking for Dr. Feelgood; People-Watching

ComicInfo.Summary: Dealer McDope travels to the Bermuda Triangle to help salvage a ship full of marijuana.
